name: HowToGetRich
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Everyone wants to get rich, but most of us aren't so lucky, so take luck out of the equation. Download How To Get Rich and hear a tip from Naval Ravikant's epic Tweet Storm on how to get rich without getting lucky everyday! This flash briefing provides daily knowledge from the world's wisest tech founder that keeps you grounded centered and focused on how to attain your financial goals in life. Naval's Twitter meditations on wealth are simple yet powerful and this app gives you the ability to hear them in a bite sized format everyday. Getting on the road to wealth creation is a simple as saying "Alexa, play my flash briefing."
